question: Which one of the following is NOT a method used for logging messages in a server-side script for a privately-scoped application?

options.B: gs.error()
options.D: gs.debug()

question: If the Create module field is selected when creating a table, what is the new module's default behavior?

options.A: Open an empty form so new records can be created
options.B: Open a link to a wiki article with instructions on how to customize the behavior of the new module
options.C: Display an empty homepage for the application
options.D: Display a list of all records from the table

question: How must Application Access be configured to prevent all other private application scopes from creating configuration records on an application's data tables?

options.A: You must create Access Controls to prevent all other application scopes from creating configuration records on an application's data tables rather than using Application Access
options.B: Set the Accessible from field value to All application scopes and de-select the Can create option
options.C: Set the Accessible from field value to This application scope only and de-select the Allow access to this table via web services option
options.D: Set the Accessible from field value to This application scope only

question: What are some of the benefits of extending an existing table such as the Task table when creating a new application?

statement_options.a: You can repurpose existing fields by simply changing the label.
statement_options.b: Use existing fields with no modifications.
statement_options.c: Existing logic from the parent table will be automatically applied to the new table.
statement_options.d: All of the parent table records are copied to the new table.

question: When configuring an Access Control which has no condition or script, which one of the following statements is NOT true?

options.A: table.*will grant access to every field in a record
options.B: table. None will grant access to every record on the table
options.C: table.field will grant access to a specific field in a record
options.D: table.id will grant access to a specific record on the table

question: Which of the following methods are useful in Access Control scripts?

options.B: gs.hasRole() and current.isNewRecord()
options.D: gs.hasRole() and current.isNew()

question: Which one of the following client-side scripts apply to Record Producers?

options.A: Catalog Client Scripts and Catalog UI Policies
options.B: UI Scripts and Ul Actions
options.C: UI Scripts and Record Producer Scripts
options.D: Client Scripts and UI Policies

question: When a ServiceNow instance requests information from a web service, ServiceNow is the web service:

options.B: Specialist
options.D: Consumer

question: Which one of the following is the fastest way to create and configure a Record Producer?

options.A: Create a Catalog Category, open the category, and select the Add New Record Producer button
options.B: Use the Record Producer module then add and configure all variables manually
options.C: Open the table in the Table records and select the Add to Service Catalog Related Link
options.D: Open the table's form, right-click on the form header, and select the Create Record Producer menu item

question: Which objects can you use in a Scheduled Script Execution (Scheduled Job) script?

options.B: GlideUser and GlideRecord
options.D: GlideSystem and current

question: Can inherited fields be deleted from a table?

options.A: Yes, select the red X in the left-most column in the table definition
options.B: Yes, but only if they are text fields
options.C: Yes, but only if there has never been any saved field data
options.D: No, inherited fields cannot be deleted from a child table

question: What is the purpose of the Application Picker?

options.B: Select an application as a favorite in the Application Navigator
options.C: Choose an application to edit and set the Application Scope
options.D: Choose an application to download and install

question: What are Application Files in a ServiceNow application?

options.A: An XML export of an application's table records
options.B: CSV files containing data imported into an application
options.D: XML exports of an application's Update Set

question: Which one of the following is NOT true for Modules?

options.B: Access to Modules is controlled with roles
options.C: Every Module must be part of an Application Menu
options.D: Every Module must be associated with a table

question: A graphical view of relationships among tables is a <blank>.

options.B: Dependency view
options.D: Map source report

question: Which one of the following is true for the Application Picker?

options.A: All custom application scope and the Global scope appear in the Application Picker
options.B: All applications in ServiceNow, including baseline applications like Incident, appear in the Application Picker
options.C: Only custom applications appear in the Application Picker
options.D: Only downloaded applications appear in the Application Picker

question: When creating an application through the Guided Application Creator, which of the following is a user experience option?

options.B: Mobile
options.D: Workspace

question: When writing a Client Script to provide feedback targeted at a specific field, which method should be used?

options.B: g_form.showFieldMsg()
options.D: g_form.addFieldMsg()

question: Which actions can a Business Rule take without scripting?

options.A: Set field values and write to the system log
options.B: Set field values and generate an event
options.C: Set field values and add message
options.D: Set field values and query the database

question: Which server-side object provides methods for working with dates when writing a script in a privately scoped application?

options.B: GlideRecord
options.D: current

question: Application developers can specify which ServiceNow page a user sees after submitting a new record using the Record Producer UI. How is the page specified?

options.A: Create an application property to store the URL
options.B: Configure the page in the Module that opens the Record Producer Ul
options.C: Write an after Business Rule script for the Record Producer's table: window.redirect = "<URL>";
options.D: Write a script in the Record Producer's Script field: producer.redirect = "<URL>";

question: Identify characteristic(s) of a Record Producer. (Choose three.)

options.A: All records created using this strategy are inserted into the Requested Item [sc_req_item] table.
options.B: Each field prompts the user with a question rather than a field label.
options.D: You can script behaviors of fields in the user interface.
options.E: Graphics can be included on the user interface.

question: Which server-side API debug log method is available for scoped applications?

options.B: gs.info()
options.D: gs.print()

question: Which script types execute on the server? (Choose three.)

options.B: Client Scripts
options.D: Script Actions

question: What is the best UX format to use for lists and forms?

options.B: Lists
options.D: Classic

question: When creating a table in a privately-scoped application, which four Access Controls are created for the table?

options.B: Create, Delete, Read, Write
options.D: Insert, Delete, Query, Update

question: Which one of the following is true for this script fragment? g_user.hasRole('x_my_app_user');

options.B: The method returns false only if the currently logged in user has the x_my_app_user role
options.C: The method returns true only if the currently logged in user has the x_my_app_user role
options.D: The method returns true if the currently logged in user has the x_my_app_user role or the admin role

question: Which one of the following database operations cannot be controlled with Application Access?

options.B: Update
options.D: Delete

question: For Application Access there is a configuration option called Allow access to this table via web services. Which one of the following statements is true when this option is selected?

options.A: This option restricts the ability to delete records via web services but records can always be read
options.B: Even when not selected, users with the correct permissions can use web services to access the table's records
options.C: This option restricts access only to SOAP web services but does not apply to REST
options.D: The user performing the query via web services must have the correct permissions to access the table's records

question: Which of the following statements must evaluate to true for a user to pass an Access Control? (Choose three.)

options.A: The user has one of the roles specified in the Required roles related list.
options.B: Scripts configured in the Access Control must evaluate to true.
options.C: Other matching Access Controls for the records evaluate to true.
options.D: Conditions configured in the Access Control must evaluate to true.
options.E: The user must be granted access through a business rule.

question: What is a workflow context?

options.A: The table for which a workflow is defined plus any conditions such as "Active is true"
options.B: It is generated from a workflow version, executes activities, and follows transitions
options.C: The business reason or process for which a workflow is designed
options.D: It is a checked out workflow which is being edited

question: Which one of the following is a benefit of creating an Application Properties page for each application you develop?

options.A: Application Properties allow a developer to override the application properties inherited from ServiceNow
options.B: An Application Properties page is a good landing page for an application
options.C: Application Properties allow a developer or admin to make changes to an application's behavior without modifying application artifacts
options.D: Application users know to go to the Application Properties page to change the appearance of an application

question: Which one of the following is NOT an example of when an application might use a Scheduled Script Execution (Scheduled Job)?

options.A: The application needs to send weekly email reminders to requestors for all records on a table
options.B: The application needs to run a clean up script on the last day of every month
options.C: The application needs to query the database every day to look for unassigned records
options.D: The application needs to run a client-side script at the same time every day

question: Which one of the following objects CANNOT be used in a Script Action script?

options.B: GlideRecord
options.D: current

question: How does ServiceNow match inbound email to existing records?

options.B: Record link
options.D: sys_id

question: When debugging Email Notifications, what must you check on a user record? (Choose three.)

options.B: The First name and Last name fields must have values.
options.C: The value in the Notification field must be set to enabled.
options.D: The user must not be locked out.
options.E: The Email field must have a value.

question: What are web services?

options.A: Methods used to create and maintain UI Pages
options.B: Methods used to allow applications to connect to other software applications over a network
options.C: Methods used to discover a wide variety of systems and applications
options.D: They provide a customer-facing view of available service and product offerings provided by departments within the organization

question: Which of the following methods is NOT part of the ServiceNow REST API?

options.B: GET
options.D: POST

question: You want Table A's records to be installed as part of the application. Table A's records will be installed when:

options.A: Table A is active and extends the Task table
options.B: Table A's records are added to the application record using the Create Application Files context menu item
options.C: Table A has an automatic number counter for new records
options.D: Table A is not included in the System Clone > Exclude Tables list

question: How can an application link to a repository behind a firewall?

options.B: Link an application to source control through a MID Server.
options.C: Link an application to source control through an access token.
options.D: Link an application to source control with multi-factor authentication.

question: What is the ServiceNow store?

options.B: Alternate name for the ServiceNow Developer Share site
options.C: The source for ServiceNow Community created developer content
options.D: Marketplace for free and paid certified ServiceNow applications and integrations

question: Tables that extend a table do what?

options.B: Do not inherit the parent's fields
options.D: Inherit the parent's fields

question: When creating an application through the Guided Application Creator, which of the following is NOT an option for creating a table?

options.B: Create table from scratch
options.D: Upload spreadsheet

question: Server-side scripts manage what?

options.B: Playbook access
options.D: Forms and Fields

question: What intuitive development interface guides users through the initial application development process?

options.B: Guided Application Creator
options.D: Flow Designer

question: What are some benefits of developing private, scoped applications? (Choose two.)

options.A: To avoid using a code repository like GitHub or GitLab
options.B: To reduce risk at code collisions
options.C: To enable installation and uninstallation of an application
options.D: To replicate ServiceNow functions a private scope

question: Which of the following statements is NOT true for the Form Designer?

options.A: To add a section to the form layout, drag it from the Field Types tab to the desired destination on the form.
options.B: To add a field to the form layout, drag the field from the Fields tab to the desired destination on the form.
options.C: To remove a field from the form layout, hover over the field to enable the Action buttons, and select the Delete (X) button.
options.D: To create a new field on a form's table, drag the appropriate data type from the Field Types tab to the form and then configure the new field.

question: What records are used to track cross-scope applications or scripts that request access to an application, application resource, or event?

options.B: Caller tracking records
options.D: Cross-scope access records

question: Which ATF Test step allows you to create a user with speeded roles and groups for the test?

options.B: Impersonation
options.D: Create a role

question: What plugin enables the Guided Application Creator?

options.B: com.glide.service_creator
options.D: com.snc.apps_creator_template
